014package org.jdbi.v3.commonstext.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.Method;
018
019import org.jdbi.v3.commonstext.StringSubstitutorTemplateEngine;
020import org.jdbi.v3.commonstext.UseStringSubstitutorTemplateEngine;
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.SqlStatements;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.TemplateEngine;
024import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config.Configurer;
025
026public class UseStringSubstitutorTemplateEngineImpl implements Configurer {
027    @Override
028    public void configureForType(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType) {
029        UseStringSubstitutorTemplateEngine anno = (UseStringSubstitutorTemplateEngine) annotation;
030        TemplateEngine engine = StringSubstitutorTemplateEngine.between(anno.prefix(), anno.suffix(), anno.escape());
031        registry.get(SqlStatements.class).setTemplateEngine(engine);
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public void configureForMethod(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
036        configureForType(registry, annotation, sqlObjectType);
037    }
038}
